H0.text: 0.128 millimeter is the length in millimeters of a 12.8‑centimeter earthworm.

H1.text: 1.28 millimeters is the length of the earthworm expressed in millimeters, derived from its 12.8‑centimeter length.

H2.text: 128 millimeters is the length, in millimeters, of an earthworm that has a length of 12.8 centimeters.

H3.text: 1280 millimeters is the length in millimeters of an earthworm that has a length of 12.8 centimeters.

A4.text: Equivalently, there are 100 centimetres in 1 metre.

A5.text: a centimetre is a unit of length in the International System of Units (SI) equal to one hundredth of a metre.
